District 6 Council Member
-------------------------

### Council Member Krista Laine

Krista Laine was elected in 2024 to represent District 6, Austin's northern and northwestern suburbs.
[Read more about Council Member Laine](https://www.austintexas.gov/department/district-6/about)
.

![Krista Laine -  Council Member District 6](https://www.austintexas.gov/sites/default/files/images/Council/Laine_Krista_bio.jpg)

Jan. 6, 2025 through Jan. 6, 2029

### District Map

Zoom and scroll to explore District 6 in the map below. Not sure if you live in District 6? Check out our
[District Lookup Map](https://www.austintexas.gov/page/city-council-district-map)
.
